description: Input configuration for ClientScout AI to discover business leads by sector and country.

sector.title: Sector
sector.description: Select the industry sector for which business leads should be generated.

country.title: Country
country.description: Enter the country name where businesses should be discovered (e.g., India, United States, Germany, Australia).

state.title: State / Province (Optional)
state.description: Optional state or province for more precise targeting.

city.title: City / Suburb (Optional)
city.description: Optional city or suburb to narrow down the search.

postcode.title: Postcode / ZIP Code (Optional)
postcode.description: Optional postcode or ZIP code for highly precise discovery.

keyword.title: Keyword (Optional)
keyword.description: Optional keyword to refine the search (e.g., corrugated box, AI startup, dermatologist).

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of business leads to collect. Lower values reduce cost.
